name: TVMediaItem.TimeRange
desc: An object that defines a time range in a media item.

items.name: var startTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time in a media item that determines when a time range begins.

items.name: var endTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time in a media item that determines when a time range ends.

items.name: var duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The duration of a time range in a media item.
